code: import{useTheme}from'./ThemeContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemedMessage=()=>{const{theme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:theme==='light'?'#333':'#fff',fontSize:'20px',fontStyle:'italic',fontWeight:'bold'},children:"this is a themed message."});};export default ThemedMessage;
